M10/1/A1HIN/SP1/HIN/TZ0/XX




       22100131


HINDI A1 – STANDARD LEVEL – PAPER 1
HINDI A1 – NIVEAU MOYEN – ÉPREUVE 1
HINDI A1 – NIVEL MEDIO – PRUEBA 1

Thursday 13 May 2010 (afternoon)
Jeudi 13 mai 2010 (après-midi)
Jueves 13 de mayo de 2010 (tarde)

1 hour 30 minutes / 1 heure 30 minutes / 1 hora 30 minutos


INSTRUCTIONS TO CANDIDATES

 Do not open this examination paper until instructed to do so.
 Write a commentary on one passage only. It is not compulsory for you to respond directly to
  the guiding questions provided. However, you may use them if you wish.

INSTRUCTIONS DESTINÉES AUX CANDIDATS

 N’ouvrez pas cette épreuve avant d’y être autorisé(e).
 Rédigez un commentaire sur un seul des passages. Le commentaire ne doit pas nécessairement
  répondre aux questions d’orientation fournies. Vous pouvez toutefois les utiliser si vous le
  désirez.

INSTRUCCIONES PARA LOS ALUMNOS

 No abra esta prueba hasta que se lo autoricen.
 Escriba un comentario sobre un solo fragmento. No es obligatorio responder directamente a
  las preguntas que se ofrecen a modo de guía. Sin embargo, puede usarlas si lo desea.




2210-0131                                                                                   5 pages/páginas
                                                             © International Baccalaureate Organization 2010
                                                                          –2–                             M10/1/A1HIN/SP1/HIN/TZ0/XX

1.

            nahIM hO, kla kaipyaa^M K%ma hao ga[-, iksaI kI yaUinafama- fT ga[- tao iksaI ka skUlabaOga.tMga Aa gayaa hU^M [na saba kI
            pZ,a[- ilaKa[- sao.” sauima~a [sa GaTnaa sao htp`Ba qaI.]sanao Aa%maIyata ko SaItla jala sao [sa QaQaktI jvaalaa kao SaaMt
     5      krnao kI Barsak kaoiSaSa kI qaI.Aba Aap sao ApnaI ja$rtaoM kao nahIM khoMgao tao @yaa dUsaro sao khoMgao.“tao @yaa k$^M maOM ?
            caaorI k$^M, yaa Daka Dala^UM yaa Aa%mah%yaa kr laU^M [na kI ja$rtaoM kI Kaitr… AaOr yah saba tumharI Sah ka natIjaa hO.
            ek pla kao psar Aae sannaaTo ko baad dUsaro hI pla yah bavaMDr jyaaoit kI Aaor baZ, calaa qaa, “AaOr tU, iksa nao kha
            qaa tuJa sao hr mahInao fama- Barnao, prIxaa fama- Barnao… kBaI irTona, kBaI pITI tao kBaI [MTrvyaU, hr mahInao maomasaahba kI
            savaarI tOyaar.kBaI idllaI, kBaI pTnaa, kBaI kaolakta”… itrskar ka yah ApdMSa ibalkula nayaa qaa jyaaoit ko ilae.
     10     BaavanaaAaoM kI yah ]maD,GaumaD, sauima~a kI naja,raoM sao iCp na sakI qaI.kcaaoT ]za qaa maa^M ka idla, “doiKe, jaao khnaa hO Aap
            mauJa sao kihe na… jyaaoit Aba baccaI nahIM rhI, baD,I hao ga[- hO.ek javaana baoTI kao Balaa [sa trh du%karnaa… kuC haoSa
            hO Aapkao ? haoSa hO tBaI tao baaola rha hU^M ik Aaja Agar [sa kI jagah Gar maoM baoTa haota tao kmaa kr laata.pirvaar ka
            sahara haota.magar yah laD,kI tao ek AiBaSaap hO… “hd krto hOM Aap BaI, Agar yah laD,kI hO tao @yaa yah [sa ka
            daoYa hO ? “ha^M, yah laD,kI hO.yahI daoYa hO [saka.AaOr [sa Gar maoM tIna tIna laD,ikyaa^M hI pOda kI tumanao.khto hue mauMSaIjaI
     15     ka svar $^MQanao lagaa qaa.Aaja pta nahIM @yaa hao gayaa hO Aapkao.Aap jaOsaa QaOya-vaana AaOr samaJadar samaJadar [nasaana BaI
            eosaI GaiTyaa baat saaoca sakta hO, maOMnao tao kBaI klpnaa tk nahIM kI qaI. tao maOMnao kba klpnaa kI qaI ik saIimat Aaya
            kI ja$rtoM [tnaI AsaIimat hao jaae^MgaI.tumhIM bataAao ik Kanaodanao ko ilae ApnaI pgaar Kca- k$^M yaa poT pr p%qar baa^MQa
            kr [sako byaah ko ilae raokD,o jamaa k$^M.]sa pr sao [sa laD,kI ko yah caaoMcalao ik baDa Aaifsar hI banana hO.kMgalao kI
            D\yaaoZ,I pr baOzkr Aasamaana Jaukanao calaI hO.jaba tk ijaMda rhogaI [sa baap kI CatI pr maU^Mga hI tao dlaogaI. jyaaoit [sa
     20     baar idllaI sao isaivala saiva-saoja ka saaxaa%kar do Aa[- qaI.saMtuYT tao qaI hI [sa prIxaa sao, magar ]sak Baraosao baOz jaanaa kha^M
            kI bauiwmaanaI haotI.kmaro maoM kuhinayaaoM ko baIca mau^Mh iCpa kr jyaaoit raotI hI jaa rhI qaI.maa^M ka snaoihla spSa- BaI Aaja
            ]sao mamataivahIna laga rha qaa.]sao laga rha qaa jaOsao vah ek laaSa hO.Aa^MK laga hI ga[- qaI ik Acaanak icahu^Mk kr jaaga
            ga[- jyaaoit.Acaanak hI ]saka caohra sa#t hao gayaa qaa.ek inaNa-ya nao ]sako Baya ko saaro AMtW-MdaoM kao Qaao Dalaa qaa AaOr
            drvaajao ka saaMkla Kaola, Amaavasa kI [sa kalaI inaSaa maoM vah gauma hao ga[- qaI.vah Apnao Gar sao ijatnaI dUr haotI jaa rhI
     25     qaI baabaU jaI ka svar AnaugaUMja AMtsa maoM AaOr AiQak Saaor macaanao lagaa qaa.Acaanak jyaaoit kao lagaa ik baabaUjaI kI Aavaaja
            ko saaqasaaqa khIM sao kao[- dUsara svar BaI Gaulaimala kr Aa rha qaa, jyaaoit… jyaaoit.AaOr ek JaTko ko saaqa Aagao baZ,I tao
            Anajaana rasta AaOr ]sa pr sao iksaI AdRSya rhsya kI ]pisqait ka ehsaasa.[saI GabarahT maoM iksaI kTo poD, ko zUMz sao
            jaa Tkra[- AaOr dd- sao ibalaibalaa ]zI qaI.ifr vahI Aavaaja, “caaoT laga ga[- na.ibanaa saaocao samaJao tuma iktnao duga-ma rasto
            pr inakla pD,I hao.” mar nahIM jaa}^MgaI [na CaoTImaaoTI zaokraoM sao.k`aoQa ko manaaovaoga sao caIKtI icallaatI hu[- baD,baD,anao lagaI
     30     qaI.bahut caaoToM sahI hO maOMnao.mar tao nahIM ga[- maOM.ha^M ma$^MgaI, Aa%mah%yaa k$^MgaI.mauJao caaoT lagao, tumhoM [sa sao @yaa matlaba.nahIM
            kao[- matlaba nahIM.jaanatI hao jyaaoit, Aa%mah%yaa maoM eosaa BaI haota hO ik k[- baar AadmaI mar nahIM pata.TUTfUT kr ek
            laMgaD,olaUlao, ApMgata kI ijaMdgaI jaIta hO.tba vah daobaara Aa%mah%yaa ka p`yaasa BaI nahIM krta.@yaaoMik ek baar ko p`yaasa
            ka ]sao kzaor ehsaasa jaao ]sao haota hO.laoikna tuma hao kaOna jaao prt dr prt mauJasao saba kuC jaana laonaa caahto hao.

     maOM jaIvana hU^M.ibalkula sa%ya AaOr saMGaYaao-M sao Bara huAa.kao[- mauJao Pyaar ka gaIt samaJakr gaunagaunaata hO tao kao[- pholaI,
  35 kao[- jaMga.ivacaaraoM kI [sa ]maD,GaumaD, maoM jyaaoit [tnaa gauma hao ga[- ik ]sao pta hI nahIM calaa ik jaMgala kba samaaPt hao gayaa.
     hr rat kI saubah haotI hO.]sa rat kI BaI saubah hu[-.Gar maoM vyaaPt KamaaoSaI kao iksaI nao JaMJaaoD,a qaa.paosTmaOna ilafafa
     qaamao baD,baD,ayaa, rijasTD- Dak hO, laIijae.KuSaI sao cahk ]zo qao mauMSaIjaI.“yao doK tora inayaui@t p~ hO.” pZ, na.puilasa
     kI sabasao baD,I AafIsar kI naaOkrI imala ga[- hO tuJao, jyaaoit sahaya, Aa[-.pI.esa. manap`aNa maoM rcabasa ga[- [sa Aavaaja kao
     AMtsa maoM mahsaUsa ikyaa qaa jyaaoit nao.Aa^MKo baMd kr ko vah Apnao mana ko AMdr Jaa^Mk Aa[- qaI.jaha^M sacamauca mausakrata
  40 ]sa ka Pyaara jaIvana qaa-jaIvanajyaaoit.

                                                                                                     manaaoja isaMha, sairta (navaMbar 2005)


      – mauMSaIjaI AaOr sauima~a ko AapsaI saMvaad evaM saMbaMQaaoM ko AaQaar pr saamaaijak samasyaa ko p`stutIkrNa maoM laoKk kha^M tk
            safla rha hO ?

      – laoKk Wara jyaaoit ko maanaisak AMtW-MW evaM manaaoBaava pr ivacaar krto hue bata[e ik pa~aoM ko cair~ ica~Na maoM laoKk
        kha^M tk safla rha hO ?

      – ]pyau-@t gaV ko SaIYa-k kI saaqa-kta pr Apnao ivacaar vya@t kIijae.

      – p`stut gad\yaaMSa kI BaaYaa - SaOlaI ko saMdBa- maoM Apnao ivacaar vya@t kIijae.

2.

                                kbjaa …

                 bacapna sao laD,kI maoM
                 Baya raopa gayaa
                 laD,ko maoM ihmmat
                 laD,kI kao dup+o sao Zka gayaa
            5    AaOr laD,ko kI
                 pIz qapqapa[- gayaI
                 daonaaoM Baa[- bahna qao.
                 pr AiQakaraoM ko Qaratla pr
                 ]nhoM ivarasat maoM
            10   dao Alaga-Alaga saMskRityaaoM ka
                 [ithasa saaOMpa gayaa
                 laD,kI ko kaomala maistYk kao
                 caalaakI sao gaZ,a gayaa
                 pu$Ya ko Anausaar Zalaa gayaa
            15   ]sako AiQakaraoM va dayaraoM kI
                 laxmaNa roKa
                 Kud ipta nao KIMcaI
                 mayaa-da kI kzaor prmprae^M
                 Baa[- nao dI
            20   laD,kI kI AiBavyai@t kOd qaI
                 laD,ka baMQanamau@t
                 maaOna ko mauK haonao kI
                 saarI saMBaavanaae^M naYT krto hue
                 KuSa qao ipta
            25   ik ibaiTyaa kao kao[- kYT nahIM haogaa
                 BaivaYya maoM
                 AaOr ibaiTyaa vat-maana maoM
                 itla-itla kr mar rhI qaI
                 baoTa Apnao sapnaaoM ko pMK fOlaa
            30   Aasamaana maoM ]D, rha qaa
                 AaOr baoTI kao pa^Mva iTkanao ko ilae BaI
                 ijasa ja,maIna kI ja$rt qaI
                 ]sa pr iksaI pu$Ya ka kbja,a qaa.

                                                     rMjanaa EaIvaastva, pirkqaa (jaulaa[- Agast 2008)

      – [sa kivata ko SaIYa-k kI saaqa-kta evaM cayana pr Apnao ivacaar p`stut kIijae.

      – kivata ka kond`Iya Baava kao kiva kha^M tk p`BaavaSaalaI ZMga sao p`stut kr payaa hO ?

      – kivata kI BaaYaa, SaOlaI tqaa p`stuitkrNa ko baaro maoM Aap @yaa khnaa caahto hOM ?

      – [sa kivata kI ivaYayavastu nao Aapko mana pr @yaa p`Baava Dalaa hO ?




2210-0131
